God of WisdomUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Expected return formula:Years till money required divided by 2, 3, or 4.If you need the money in 7 years, you should expect a 1.75-3.5% return. Thus, investing only in short term bonds, or even short term endowment plans would be ideal. Stocks and equity funds would be too volatile for such a short term.1 comment2
